definition: toss a peach, get back a plum (idiom); to return a favor/to exchange gifts/Scratch my back, and I'll scratch yours.
to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of

sentences.english: There are indications that the United States has probably reciprocated.
sentences.chinese: 有跡象顯示，美國方面有可能投桃報李。

sentences.english: Chinese's good intentions, also obtained the foreign disability athlete's exchange of gifts between friends.
sentences.chinese: 中國人的善意，也得到了外國殘疾運動員的投桃報李。

sentences.english: When you help others to succeed, they will do likewise for you.
sentences.chinese: 你幫別人取得成功，別人也會投桃報李。

definition: a tax declaration form/a tax return
lit. to settle accounts after autumn/settle scores at an opportune moment (idiom)
to whisper to one another's ear
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline

(neologism c. 2013) organized disruption of healthcare facilities or verbal and physical abuse of medical staff, by an aggrieved patient or proxies such as family members or hired thugs, typically aimed at obtaining compensation
to rob the rich to help the poor
lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom)/fig. to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
